pages.text: $(l)$(item)All-seeing lens$() - is a purple lens, that channels elemental energy through itself and maybe can even boost some elemental reactions!

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: Being pretty hard to create, the only known way to get it is to buy it from the $(l:elementalamulets:world/jeweller)Jeweller$(), as he knows how to do it.$(br2) But, $(o)they need to trust you$()! So you can buy it at level 5 (Master level)
